cnnvdDetail.vulName: Digital UNIX  Advanced File System Utility (advfs)权限许可和访问控制漏洞。
cnnvdDetail.vulDesc: Digital UNIX中的Advanced File System Utility (advfs)存在漏洞。本地用户可以利用该漏洞获得权限。
